fn.p: Suggested citation for this article: Humblet M-F, Vandeputte S, Albert A, Gosset C, Kirschvink N, Haubruge E, et al. Multidisciplinary and evidence-based method for prioritizing diseases of food-producing animals and zoonoses. Emerg Infect Dis [serial on the Internet]. 2012 Apr [ date cited]. http://dx.doi.org/10.3201/eid1804.111151
These authors contributed equally to this article.
